channel.title: Client only works with JRE7
channel.description: ok so my client only works with jre7 i change the paths to jre6 and jdk 6 and compile it i get this warning: [code]warning: .\sign\signlink.class: major version 51 is newer than 50, the highest m ajor version supported by this compiler. It is recommended that the compiler be upgraded. Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 warning Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I close compiler log then run it and it opens log shows error and closes to quick for me to cap the error. Someone can tell me how to fix this? most players leave the server instead of getting jre7

item.title: Client only works with JRE7
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

ok so my client only works with jre7 i change the paths to jre6 and jdk 6 and compile it i get this warning:

warning: .\sign\signlink.class: major version 51 is newer than 50, the highest m ajor version supported by this compiler. It is recommended that the compiler be upgraded. Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 warning Press any key to continue . . .
I close compiler log then run it and it opens log shows error and closes to quick for me to cap the error. Someone can tell me how to fix this? most players leave the server instead of getting jre7

Read full topic
